items.name: LanguageManager
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: LanguageManager
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class LanguageManager
    ###*
    * Manages the different languages of the game.  
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class LanguageManager
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: ->
        ###*
        * The default language profile.
        * @property defaultProfile
        * @type gs.LanguageProfile
        ### 
        @defaultProfile = null
        
        ###*
        * The current language profile.
        * @property profile
        * @type gs.LanguageProfile
        ### 
        @profile = null
        
        ###*
        * The current strings bundle.
        * @property bundle
        * @type gs.LanguageStringsBundle
        ### 
        @bundle = null
        
        ###*
        * The default strings bundle.
        * @property defaultBundle
        * @type gs.LanguageStringsBundle
        ### 
        @defaultBundle = null
        
    ###*
    * Initializes the language system by loading the necessary language profiles
    * and strings bundles.
    *
    * @method initialize
    ###
    initialize: ->
        @languages = []
        DataManager.getDocumentByType("custom_strings_bundle")
        documents = DataManager.getDocumentsByType("language_profile")
        
        for document in documents
            @languages.push({ name: document.items.name, code: document.items.code, uid: document.uid, icon: document.items.icon, bundleUid: document.items.bundleUid, wordWrap: document.items.wordWrap ? "spaceBased" })
            if document.uid == "07DDA0716161F104" # Default Profile
                @language = @languages[@languages.length-1]
                @defaultLanguage = @language
           
        @selectLanguage(@language)     
        if @language.uid != @defaultLanguage.uid
            @defaultProfile = DataManager.getDocument(@defaultLanguage.uid)
        else
            @defaultProfile = @profile
    
    ###*
    * Loads the necessary strings bundles for the current language. 
    *
    * @method loadBundles
    ###        
    loadBundles: ->
        customStrings = DataManager.getDocumentByType("custom_strings_bundle")
        if @language.uid != @defaultLanguage.uid
            @bundle = DataManager.getDocument(@language.bundleUid)

              
        @defaultBundle = { items: { localizableStrings: {} } }
        
        Object.mixin(@defaultBundle.items.localizableStrings, customStrings.items.localizableStrings)
        
        return @language.uid != @defaultLanguage.uid
    
    ###*
    * Sets the specified language as current language.
    *
    * @method selectLanguage
    * @param {Object} language - The language to set.
    ###      
    selectLanguage: (language) ->
        @language = language
        @profile = DataManager.getDocument(@language.uid)
        
    ###*
    * Gets the string for the specified id. If the string doesn't exist for current
    * language, its taken from the default language.
    *
    * @method string
    * @param {String} id - The ID of the string to get.
    * @return {String} The string for the specified ID. If the string could not be found the result
    * is an empty string.
    ###     
    string: (id) -> 
        result = null

        if @bundle? and @bundle.items?
            result = @bundle.items.localizableStrings[id]
            if result?.t?
                result = result.t

        if not result? or result.length == 0
            result = @stringFromDefault(id)
            
        return result
    
    ###*
    * Gets the string for the specified id in default language.
    *
    * @method stringFromDefault
    * @param {String} id - The ID of the string to get.
    * @return {String} The string for the specified ID. If the string could not be found the result
    * is an empty string.
    ###      
    stringFromDefault: (id) ->
        result = null
        
        if @defaultBundle? and @defaultBundle.items?
            result = @defaultBundle.items.localizableStrings[id]?.t
            
        return result
 
window.LanguageManager = new LanguageManager()
gs.LanguageManager = LanguageManager

window.lcsi = (id) -> if id? then window.LanguageManager.string(id) || "" else ""
window.lcs = (value) -> return if (value? and (value.lcId? or value.defaultText?)) then window.LanguageManager.string(value.lcId) || value?.defaultText?.t || value?.defaultText else value
window.lcsm = (value) -> return lcs(value) #return if value.lcId? then window.LanguageManager.stringFromBundle(value.lcId, window.LanguageManager.mapBundle) || value.defaultText else value
